Title: Shaky Grounds
Description:
In the name of Khaz'goroth, what goes on here? 

This magma works with a mind of its own, consuming these elemental cavestones from below. Tis more than chance causin' this... I aim to figure it out!

Place these Shattering Totems next to each trapped elemental to free them!
ObjectivesText: Place the Shattering Totems to free the trapped cavestones.
